author: Peter Zimonjic
title: Air passengers will be required to wear non-medical masks starting April 20
description: The federal government is rolling out new rules requiring that all air travellers wear face masks covering their noses and mouths while in transit.
content:
The federal government is rolling out new rules requiring that all air travellers wear face masks covering their noses and mouths while in transit.
Transport Minister Marc Garneau announced a package of new measures Friday that also will require people flyin… [+2108 chars]
